enchantment.mcdar.beast_boss.desc: Increases the amount of damage your pets deal.
enchantment.mcdar.beast_burst.desc: Using a healing potion causes an explosion at your pets' locations, dealing damage to mobs around them.
enchantment.mcdar.beast_surge.desc: Using your health potion boosts your pets' attack and movement speed for 10 seconds.
